Replace.Text: The Devil Comes to the World

Cities do not generate war weariness. Conquered cities will not lose [ICON_Citizen] population, and each academy in them will have [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka enabled. Cities with garrison units gain additional [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty. Defeating an enemy unit within an enemy city's borders will cause the city to lose [ICON_Loyalty]. [NEWLINE]All units [ICON_Strength] are unaffected by damage. Military units can still move after upgrading or attacking. Each military policy provides +1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE] When you kill a unit, you will get [ICON_Science] technology value equivalent to 100% of the combat power; if the unit you kill is from the previous era, the reward will be doubled. [NEWLINE][ICON_Resource_Uranium] uranium resources are displayed after researching ironmaking. All units are resistant to [ICON_Nuclear][ICON_ThermoNuclear] nuclear explosion damage and immune to [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation damage.

Cities do not generate war weariness. Conquered cities do not lose [ICON_Citizen] population, and each theater square in them will bring [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypse. Cities with garrison units gain additional [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty. Defeating an enemy unit within an enemy city's borders will cause the city to lose [ICON_Loyalty]. [NEWLINE]All units [ICON_Strength] are unaffected by damage. Military units can still move after upgrading or attacking. Each military policy provides +1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE] When you kill a unit, you will get [ICON_Culture] culture value equal to 100% of the combat power; if the unit you kill is from the previous era, the reward will be doubled. [NEWLINE][ICON_Resource_Uranium] uranium resources are displayed after researching ironmaking. All units are resistant to [ICON_Nuclear][ICON_ThermoNuclear] nuclear explosion damage and immune to [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation damage.
Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban", the capital +80% [ICON_Gold] gold coins. Alliance trade route +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. Allows buying regions with [ICON_Gold] coins.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban", when an emergency occurs, an additional bonus will be obtained. Earn rewards even if emergency events are not completed. [NEWLINE]When you create a [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route with a more advanced civilization, you can get the corresponding [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse. [NEWLINE] Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant or [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, you trigger a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka: Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatProphet] ] Great Prophet, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist or [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Admiral of the Navy, you trigger a [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypse. [NEWLINE]The professional area of ​​the city where the third-level chief executive is located provides 1 corresponding [ICON_greatperson] great person point.

When the population of the capital reaches 3/5/8/13/21, you will get a piece of soybean flour bread, which is a luxury resource. Capital's [ICON_Production] production bonus can be stacked. [NEWLINE] At the beginning of a round, 10% of [ICON_Production] productivity per round will be transferred to [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_Culture] culture value; 10% of [ICON_Gold] gold coins will be transferred to [ICON_Food] food per round. [NEWLINE]All walls can be purchased with gold coins. [NEWLINE]When you create a [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route with a more advanced civilization, you can get the corresponding [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban", the city +10% [ICON_Science] technology value, the capital additionally +40% [ICON_Science] technology value. A happy city gets +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points for every academy it has. Cities with ecstatic happiness get double the bonus.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban", the game is located in the ocean cell at the beginning, land units can board ships and have the ability to enter the ocean cell, and pioneers can build cities in the sea area. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value every round before opening up the first city. [NEWLINE]Units ignore the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost from embarking and disembarking. Not subject to flood damage.

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang·Juban", cities with happy sense of happiness +10% [ICON_Culture] culture value. Cities with ecstatic happiness get double the bonus. [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse boosted to 60%.

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban Fan", the resource conversion at the beginning of each round will get an additional 50%. [NEWLINE] Peacetime +100% [ICON_GreatPerson] great man points of [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer and [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist; wartime +100% [ICON_GreatPerson] great man points of [ICON_GreatGeneral] General and [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Admiral of the Navy.
Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban" and "Shenwei Lingzhuang Jufan Fan", it has all the characteristics of cross-dressing ten incense.
Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Juban" and "Shenwei Lingzhuang Jufan Fan", it has all the characteristics of cross-dressing Tianxiang.

Civilizations that like to go to war with other factions. Contempt for civilizations at peace. Grudges generated by this leader are reduced at double rate. [NEWLINE]Loves civilizations with great military power and tries to ally with them to avoid war. Dislikes civilizations with weak arms. [NEWLINE]Attempt to create a large number of regiments and legions, respecting like-minded civilizations. Hate civilizations that cannot create corps or idle armies. [NEWLINE]Armies will be raised from city-states. Likes civilizations that also use city-state armies, and dislikes civilizations that are noncommittal to mercenaries. [NEWLINE]Sympathy for barbarians. Hates civilizations that destroy barbarian outposts.
Yatogami Tohka unique Classic Era melee unit, replaces Swordsman. [NEWLINE]The unique improvement facility Huang Ji Fortress can be built.

Yatogami Tohka is a unique modern melee unit that replaces infantry. [NEWLINE]Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting units with higher base combat strength. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting on your capital continent.
Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting units with higher basic Combat Strength. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting on your capital continent.

The Ten Incense of Christmas unique medieval heavy cavalry unit, replacing the knight. [NEWLINE]Land units located within 1 cell of Elite Soldiers gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength or [ICON_Religion] Religious Combat Strength.
Land units within 1 cell range of elite soldiers can get +4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength or [ICON_Religion] religious combat strength.
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when within 1 cell range of Elite Soldiers.
+{1_Amount} religious combat power when within 1 cell range of elite soldiers.
+{1_Amount} combat power when within 1 cell range of elite soldiers.
Summer Toka unique Classic Era ranged naval unit that replaces Quadruples. [NEWLINE]Has extra range. +10[ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against other units.
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting with each unit

Kill the Huangshixiang characteristic medieval melee unit, replacing the armored warrior. [NEWLINE]If the unit starts its turn in enemy territory, [ICON_Movement] has 4 movement. +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, -5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending against melee attacks.
Lucky Rabbit Tohka unique medieval heavy cavalry unit that replaces the knight. [NEWLINE]Will not suffer combat debuffs when taking damage.

Nadeshiko Toka unique medieval light cavalry unit that replaces the Stalker. [NEWLINE]Units are more powerful when they are near or on the mainland. Can move after attacking if there is remaining mobility.
Starry Night Toka unique unit, replacing Armored Warrior. [NEWLINE]Melee units are strong against ranged attacks. Low [ICON_Production] production cost.
+10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending against long-range attacks.

Yatogami Tenka is a Classic Era melee unit that replaces the Swordsman. [NEWLINE]The characteristic improvement facility, Miasaki Fortress, can be built. [NEWLINE]All adjacent enemy units have -5[ICON_Strength] combat strength.

Yatogami Tenka is a unique modern melee unit that replaces infantry. [NEWLINE]Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting units with higher base combat strength. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting on continents other than your capital.
Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting units with higher basic Combat Strength. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting on continents other than your capital.
Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting units with higher basic Combat Strength.

Abyssal Fragrant Medieval heavy cavalry unit that replaces knights. [NEWLINE]Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting units with higher base combat strength. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when against area defenses.
Gain +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting units with higher basic combat strength. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when against area defenses.
+{1_Amount} combat strength against units with higher base combat strength.
+{1_Amount} combat power when attacking area defense.

Pirate Celestial Unique Ancient Era naval unit that replaces the Galley. [NEWLINE]Ability to pillage enemy coastal lands and capture nearby civilians through its Coastal Sweep ability. Can be restored in neutral waters. When in coastal waters, [ICON_Movement] has a movement force of 4.
The next attack will leave [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation on the attack path and around the target and cause some damage. 100% effective when attacking cities and camps from a distance.
The next attack will leave [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation on the attack path and around the target and cause some damage. 100% effective when attacking cities and camps from a distance.
The next attack will leave [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation on the attack path and around the target and cause some damage. 100% effective when attacking cities and camps from a distance.
: [NEWLINE] The next attack will leave [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation on the attack path and around the target and cause some damage. (consumes {1_iAmount}[ICON_Resource_Uranium] uranium)
: [NEWLINE] The next attack will leave [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation on the attack path and around the target and cause some damage. (consumes {1_iAmount}[ICON_Resource_Uranium] uranium)
: [NEWLINE] The next attack will leave [ICON_Resource_Uranium] nuclear radiation on the attack path and around the target and cause some damage. (consumes {1_iAmount}[ICON_Resource_Uranium] uranium)

Yatogami Tohka's characteristic building, replacing the camp. Each adjacent area provides +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value. After researching and developing the "flying" technology, you can get [ICON_Tourism] tourism achievements equal to the output of [ICON_Culture] cultural value. [NEWLINE]Every six cities provide an additional military policy slot. [NEWLINE]This area can be built without population, and the construction cost is relatively low. It cannot be built next to the city center. It does not provide [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points, and it is not a special area.

Yatogami Tenka's characteristic building, replacing the camp. Each adjacent area provides +2 [ICON_Science] technology value. After researching and developing the "flying" technology, you can get [ICON_Tourism] tourism achievements equal to the output of [ICON_Science] technology value. [NEWLINE]Every six cities provide an additional military policy slot. [NEWLINE]This area can be built without population, and the construction cost is relatively low. It cannot be built next to the city center. It does not provide [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points, and it is not a special area.
A unique Yatogami building that replaces the bank. [NEWLINE]For each different strategic resource improved in this city, it can accumulate 1 additional strategic resource.

Yatogami Tianxiang characteristic building. [NEWLINE]Provides the walls surrounding the city center and camp area. The city walls allow [ICON_Ranged] ranged attacks in the city center and camp area, the walls must be destroyed before attacking the city. Provide 1 [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance after obtaining the "Save" municipality.

Yatogami Tianxiang characteristic building. [NEWLINE]Increase your external defenses. After obtaining the "Save" municipality, it will provide 3 [ICON_Tourism] tourism achievements. The city will not be affected by the battering ram.

Yatogami Tianxiang characteristic building. [NEWLINE]Upgrade your external defenses to optimal levels. After obtaining the "Save" municipality, it will provide 5 [ICON_Tourism] tourism achievements. The city will not be affected by siege towers or battering rams.

High school ten incense characteristic building, replacing the university. Every citizen in the city +0.6 [ICON_Science] skill value income per round. [NEWLINE]Gives [ICON_Culture] equal to the adjacency bonus of the Academy District.

Christmas ten incense characteristic building, replacing the temple. Allows buying pioneers with [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE]Civilian units, Apostles and Inquisitors can be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith after construction. Holy land areas get an additional standard adjacency bonus from forests. For this purpose, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] production for each ocean resource cell in the city.

Christmas ten incense characteristic building, replacing the temple. Allows buying pioneers with [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE]Civilian units, Apostles and Inquisitors can be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith after construction. Holy land areas get an additional standard adjacency bonus from forests. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each ocean resource tile in the city. Recalling heroes in this city will reduce the consumption of [ICON_Faith] Faith Points by 15%.
Yatogami Tohka's characteristic building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Occupying units get +6[ICON_Strength] defense and automatically get fortifications for two turns.

Yatogami Tianxiang characteristic building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Occupying units get +6[ICON_Strength] defense and automatically get fortifications for two turns. Occupied units still heal health even if they have moved or attacked. Must be built on Hills tiles.
Huang Ji/Miasa Ji Fortress provides +1 vision range
The imperial concubine/Miasma concubine's fortress provides +5 cure for boils every round
Huang Ji/Miasa Ji Fortress provides detection of invisible units
